name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience in API design and integration patterns, I bring a strong proficiency in **Golang**, **TypeScript**, and modern AI technologies. My expertise includes distributed systems design patterns and event-driven architectures, particularly leveraging **Kafka** for scalable solutions. I have a solid understanding of the CAP Theorem and Backend for Frontend (BFF) strategies, ensuring optimal developer experience.

I have successfully built high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing modern frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My deep cloud experience spans **Azure** and **AWS**. I've developed enterprise-grade platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities for advanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

Furthermore, I employ a robust microservices architecture and CI/CD automation practices to develop secure applications in compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My proficiency in MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, complements my extensive background in real-time data processing. I am committed to ownership and accountability in my work, driving successful project outcomes.
